Tasks.Task Description: Determine the number and type of Azure Dedicated Hosts required based on workload requirements and ensure proper allocation to meet performance and compliance needs.
Set up host groups to organize and manage Azure Dedicated Hosts effectively. Ensure proper placement policies are applied for high availability.
Use Azure Monitor to continuously track the health and performance of Azure Dedicated Hosts. Set up alerts for any anomalies or potential issues.
Ensure that all security updates and patches are applied to the Azure Dedicated Hosts to maintain compliance and protect against vulnerabilities.
Analyze the utilization of Azure Dedicated Hosts to ensure optimal resource usage. Identify underutilized or overutilized hosts and take corrective actions.
Conduct failover tests to ensure workloads can be seamlessly moved to other hosts in case of hardware failure or maintenance.
Regularly audit the configurations of Azure Dedicated Hosts to ensure they align with organizational policies and compliance requirements.
Backup metadata and configuration details of Azure Dedicated Hosts to ensure quick recovery in case of accidental changes or failures.
Maintain up-to-date documentation for Azure Dedicated Hosts, including operational procedures, configurations, and troubleshooting guides.
Provide regular training to the operations team on managing Azure Dedicated Hosts, including new features, best practices, and troubleshooting techniques.
Ensure that Azure Dedicated Hosts meet the agreed Service Level Agreements (SLAs) and address any deviations promptly.
Periodically review and optimize the placement of workloads on Azure Dedicated Hosts to ensure efficient resource utilization and cost-effectiveness.
Conduct incident response drills to prepare the team for potential issues with Azure Dedicated Hosts. Ensure familiarity with escalation procedures.
Review the cost associated with Azure Dedicated Hosts and identify opportunities for cost savings without compromising performance or compliance.
